name: Seeds of Rebirth
description:
Stay out of the forest. Every child in Grimoak learns that, and hears the tales. Tales of tree devils and spooks.

But what do you do when you wake up in the depths of Ghostroot Wilds, with no memory of how you got there?

Controls

  • Supports keyboard and gamepad.
  • Use WASD or left analogue script to move.
  • Use space or A to jump.

Notes

  • Made in one month for Metroidvania Month XVI.
  • We didn't have time to add the boss, so there's no real ending. If you find all four forms, you can call that a win.

Credits

  • Art by Treebeef2
  • Music by Gabriel Cantor (@GabrielCantorVT)
  • Programming by DivFord
